name: ConstructionClass
title: Construction Class
description: Construction Class codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: High-end construction featuring premium materials, architectural details, and superior craftsmanship with finishes that exceed typical building standards.
Construction built to specific client specifications with unique design elements, tailored floor plans, and personalized features.
Construction meeting typical building codes and industry norms with conventional materials and commonly used design patterns.
Cost-efficient construction utilizing basic materials and simple design to minimize building expenses while meeting minimum code requirements.
Construction using production-grade materials and finishes commonly employed by volume builders in tract housing developments.
Construction featuring above-average materials and finishes with enhanced features that exceed standard quality but fall short of luxury specifications.
Construction class that does not fit within predefined categories.
